want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better. the Met said the complex inquiry was being moved from their counter terrorism command. It will now be led by Deputy Assistant Commissioner Sue Akers at the specialist crime directorate. A Met spokesman said: The Met has today received significant new information relating to allegations of phone hacking at the News of the World in 2005/06. As a result, the Met is launching a new investigation to consider this material. "This work will be carried out by the specialist crime directorate which has been investigating a related phone hacking allegation since September 2010. Last week, former News of the World editor Andy Coulson resigned as David Cameron 's communications chief, though he has continually denied any knowledge of hacking during his time at the paper.
